name: Aceternity UI
description: A customizable group of cards that move infinitely in a loop. Made with Framer Motion and Tailwind CSS.

props.Type: { quote: string; name: string; title: string; }[]
props.Description: An array of objects, each containing a quote, name, and title.
The direction of the animation. Default is "left".
The speed of the animation. Default is "fast".
If true, the animation will pause when the mouse hovers over it. Default is true.
Optional additional CSS classes to apply to the component.

usage_notes: A customizable group of cards that move infinitely in a loop. Made with Framer Motion and Tailwind CSS.
